# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily experience. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I propose a price of $150 for it. I believe this offer reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with an opportunity to enjoy its benefits. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
